description: Human-readable title of the map layer/service shown to users in layer selectors and legends.
Flag indicating the layer is a basemap background (single, mutually exclusive) rather than an overlay; used to control default display and toggling.
Mapping library layer type/class used to instantiate the service on the client (e.g., tile layer); determines how requests are made and rendered.
Base endpoint URL of the GIS service used by the client to request tiles or features.
Serialized configuration settings for the client map layer (e.g., attribution, zoom limits, subdomains); parsed to control behavior, styling, and credits.
Unique identifier for the GIS service configuration record.
User or process that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created (UTC unless otherwise noted).
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record (UTC unless otherwise noted).
User or process that last updated the record.
Numeric sequence used for display order or drawing priority among services; likely lower numbers render or list first; confirm with SME.
